items.text: fuller on middle and leg, pushes it towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on middle and off, defended towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: pitched up outside off, pushed towards covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, slower off the wicket, chipped towards the bowler from the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: down the wicket and looks to go over long-on, ends up slicing it over extra cover, lands wide of the long-off fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: fuller on the stumps, pushed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length, punched off the front foot but straight to the cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length outside off, spinning away and almost squaring the batsman up, a huge appeal, not out. Mashrafe think of taking the review but decided against in the end. Replays show it was going over
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length, down the leg side, glanced fine this time, comes back for the second
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 2 leg byes

items.text: length outside off, moves across and blocks
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.preText: Aman Kumar: "I think @Nitish said, the slowest OPENER in ODIs" -- Ah, missed the opener bit there, he might be the slowest opener
items.text: fuller outside off, pushed towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, 1 run

items.text: length ball, on the stumps, flicked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, in the zone and driven crisply through covers for four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: works it towards the left of deep square leg this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: flatter and quicker on the stumps, angled in, blocked from the crease
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven but straight to the cover fielder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: arm ball, keeping quite low this one, Hope did well to get his bat on it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length o middle and leg, nudged towards square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller on the pads, flicked past the mid-on fielder, a bit tag team work near the deep midwicket boundary as the batsmen complete three
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 3 runs

items.text: length, just outside off, Powell plays it late and opens the face of the bat to guide it towards short third man
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, no run

items.text: length outside off, looks to go aerial, down the ground, ends up skying it over cover-point, Rubel takes a couple of steps back and grabs it over his shoulder
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to KOA Powell, OUT

dismissal.text: KOA Powell c Rubel Hossain b Shakib Al Hasan 10 (27b 1x4 0x6) SR: 37.03

items.text: length outside off, looks to cut it hard, not much room there and misses
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, defends it on the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run
